from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType
from datetime import datetime
from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, TimestampType, StringType

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, trim, regexp_replace

%%sql

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.load_sap_hr (
    PersNo                  STRING,
    Firstname               STRING,
    Lastname                STRING,
    EmployeeNo              STRING,
    CoCd                    STRING,
    CompanyCode             STRING,
    PA                      STRING,
    PersonnelArea           STRING,
    PSubarea                STRING,
    PersonnelSubarea        STRING,
    Orgunit                 STRING,
    OrganizationalUnit      STRING,
    Organizationalkey       STRING,
    OrganizationalKey1      STRING,
    WorkC                   STRING,
    WorkContract            STRING,
    CT                      STRING,
    ContractType            STRING,
    PSgroup                 STRING,
    PayBandDescription      STRING,
    FTE                     DOUBLE,
    Wkhrs                   DOUBLE,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee BOOLEAN,
    S                       STRING,
    EmploymentStatus        STRING,
    GenderKey               STRING,
    TRAStartDate            DATE,
    TRAEndDate              DATE,
    TRAStatus               STRING,
    TRAGrade                STRING,
    PrevPersNo              STRING,
    ActR                    STRING,
    ReasonforAction         STRING,
    Position                STRING,
    Position1               STRING,
    CostCtr                 STRING,
    CostCentre              STRING,
    CivilServiceStart        DATE,
    DatetoCurrentJob        DATE,
    SeniorityDate           DATE,
    DatetoSubstGrade        DATE,
    PersNo1                 STRING,
    NameofManagerOM         STRING,
    ManagerPosition         STRING,
    ManagerPositionText     STRING,
    CounterSignManager      STRING,
    Loc                      STRING,
    Location                STRING,
    OrgStartDate            DATE,
    FixTermEndDate           DATE,
    LoanStartDate           DATE,
    LoanEndDate             DATE,
    EEGrp                   STRING,
    EmployeeGroup           STRING,
    Annualsalary            DOUBLE,
    Curr                    STRING,
    NInumber                STRING,
    Birthdate               DATE,
    Ageofemployee           INT,
    EO                      STRING,
    Ethnicorigin            STRING,
    NID                     STRING,
    Rel                     STRING,
    ReligiousDenominationKey STRING,
    SxO                     STRING,
    WageType                STRING,
    EmployeeSubgroup        STRING,
    LOAAbsType              STRING,
    LOAAbsenceTypeText      STRING,
    Schemereference         STRING,
    PensionSchemeName       STRING,
    DisabilityCode          STRING,
    DisabilityText          STRING,
    DisabilityCodeDescription STRING,
    PArea                   STRING,
    PayrollArea             STRING,
    AssignmentNumber        STRING,
    FTE2                    DOUBLE,
    Report_MonthEnd_Date    DATE,
    PDAC_ETL_Date            DATE
)
USING delta
LOCATION 'abfss://odw-harmonised@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/sap_hr';

%%pyspark


spark.sql("""
INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR
(
    PersNo,
    Firstname,
    Lastname,
    EmployeeNo,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PA,
    PersonnelArea,
    PSubarea,
    PersonnelSubarea,
    Orgunit,
    OrganizationalUnit,
    Organizationalkey,
    OrganizationalKey1,
    WorkC,
    WorkContract,
    CT,
    ContractType,
    PSgroup,
    PayBandDescription,
    FTE,
    Wkhrs,
    IndicatorPartTimeEmployee,
    S,
    EmploymentStatus,
    GenderKey,
    TRAStartDate,
    TRAEndDate,
    TRAStatus,
    TRAGrade,
    PrevPersNo,
    ActR,
    ReasonforAction,
    Position,
    Position1,
    CostCtr,
    CostCentre,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DatetoCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    DatetoSubstGrade,
    PersNo1,
    NameofManagerOM,
    ManagerPosition,
    ManagerPositionText,
    CounterSignManager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    Annualsalary,
    Curr,
    NInumber,
    Birthdate,
    Ageofemployee,
    EO,
    Ethnicorigin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    ReligiousDenominationKey,
    SxO,
    WageType,
    EmployeeSubgroup,
    LOAAbsType,
    LOAAbsenceTypeText,
    Schemereference,
    PensionSchemeName,
    DisabilityCode,
    DisabilityText,
    DisabilityCodeDescription,
    PArea,
    PayrollArea,
    AssignmentNumber,
    FTE2,
    Report_MonthEnd_Date,
    PDAC_ETL_Date
)
SELECT
    PersNo,
    Firstname,
    Lastname,
    EmployeeNo,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PA,
    PersonnelArea,
    PSubarea,
    PersonnelSubarea,
    Orgunit,
    OrganizationalUnit,
    Organizationalkey,
    OrganizationalKey1,
    WorkC,
    WorkContract,
    CT,
    ContractType,
    PSgroup,
    PayBandDescription,
    cast(FTE AS FLOAT),
    cast(Wkhrs AS FLOAT),
    cast(IndicatorPartTimeEmployee AS BOOLEAN),
    S,
    EmploymentStatus,
    GenderKey,
    try_cast(TRAStartDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(TRAEndDate AS DATE),
    TRAStatus,
    TRAGrade,
    PrevPersNo,
    ActR,
    ReasonforAction,
    Position,
    Position1,
    CostCtr,
    CostCentre,
    try_cast(CivilServiceStart AS DATE),
    try_cast(DatetoCurrentJob AS DATE),
    try_cast(SeniorityDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(DatetoSubstGrade AS DATE),
    PersNo1,
    NameofManagerOM,
    ManagerPosition,
    ManagerPositionText,
    CounterSignManager,
    Loc,
    Location,
    try_cast(OrgStartDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(FixTermEndDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(LoanStartDate AS DATE),
    try_cast(LoanEndDate AS DATE),
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    cast(Annualsalary AS DOUBLE),
    Curr,
    NULL AS NInumber,
    try_cast(Birthdate AS DATE),
    cast(Ageofemployee AS INT),
    EO,
    Ethnicorigin,
    NID,
    Rel,
    ReligiousDenominationKey,
    SxO,
    WageType,
    EmployeeSubgroup,
    LOAAbsType,
    LOAAbsenceTypeText,
    Schemereference,
    PensionSchemeName,
    DisabilityCode,
    DisabilityText,
    DisabilityCodeDescription,
    PArea,
    PayrollArea,
    AssignmentNumber,
    cast(FTE2 AS FLOAT),
    NULL AS Report_MonthEnd_Date,
    current_timestamp() AS PDAC_ETL_Date
FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_history_monthly

%%sql
    SELECT 
    to_date('2024-01-31','yyyy-MM-dd') AS file_date
FROM 
    odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement
LIMIT 1;

%%sql

SELECT 
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    f.absence_hours,
    l.leave_start_date,
    fd.file_date
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_harmonised_db.fact_absence_all f
ON 
    h.PersNo = cast(f.staffnumber as int)
LEFT JOIN 
    StaffCost l 
ON 
    cast(f.staffnumber as int) = l.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    CarriedOver co 
ON 
    cast(f.staffnumber as int) = co.staff_number
CROSS JOIN 
    FileDate fd
WHERE 
    f.AttendanceorAbsenceType IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
    AND f.absence_date BETWEEN l.leave_start_date AND fd.file_date
LIMIT 100;

%%sql
select distinct AttendanceorAbsenceType from odw_harmonised_db.fact_absence_all 
where AttendanceorAbsenceType IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW LeaveTaken AS
SELECT
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    SUM(f.absence_hours) AS leave_hours_taken
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_harmonised_db.fact_absence_all f
ON 
    h.PersNo = cast(f.staffnumber as int)

LEFT JOIN 
    StaffCost l 
ON 
    cast(f.staffnumber as int) = l.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    CarriedOver co 
ON 
    cast(f.staffnumber as int)  = co.staff_number

CROSS JOIN 
    FileDate fd  -- Add this join to reference fd.file_date
WHERE 
    f.AttendanceorAbsenceType IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
   -- AND f.absence_date BETWEEN l.leave_start_date AND fd.file_date
GROUP BY 
    h.PersNo;

%%sql

-- Step 1: Delete all records from the table (for testing purposes)
DELETE FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR;

-- Step 2: Create a temporary table to store Report_MonthEnd_Date values
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW MonthEndDates AS
SELECT Report_MonthEnd_Date
FROM odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR
GROUP BY Report_MonthEnd_Date;

-- Step 3: Extract file date from the source file name
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW FileDate AS
SELECT 
    to_date('2025-01-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS file_date
FROM 
    odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement
LIMIT 1;

-- Step 4: Calculate staff cost
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW StaffCost AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    h.PSgroup AS grade,
    h.Annualsalary AS salary,
    CAST(h.Annualsalary AS DOUBLE) / (365.0 * 7.4) AS hourly_rate,
    CASE 
        WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
        ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
    END AS leave_start_date,
    to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd') AS date_from_file_name,
    le.Number * ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1) AS expected_leave_taken_hrs,
    le.Number * (1 - ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1)) AS expected_leave_hours_remaining,
    le.Number AS leave_allowance,
    ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1) AS percent_leave_year_passed,
    (1 - ABS((datediff(
        CASE 
            WHEN datediff(le.Dedfrom, fd.file_date) >= 0 THEN le.Dedfrom
            ELSE date_add(le.Dedfrom, -365)
        END,
        to_date(substring(le.file_name, 19, 8), 'yyyyMMdd')
    ) / 364.25) % 1)) AS percent_leave_year_remaining,
    h.ContractType
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement le 
ON 
    h.PersNo = CASE 
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '4' THEN CONCAT('50', le.StaffNumber)
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '5' THEN CONCAT('00', le.StaffNumber)
        ELSE CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING)
    END
CROSS JOIN 
    FileDate fd
WHERE 
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Annual Leave / P&P';

-- Step 5: Calculate carried-over hours
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW CarriedOver AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    CASE 
        WHEN le.Number - 148 >= 0 THEN 148
        ELSE le.Number
    END AS carried_over_hours
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_standardised_db.leave_entitlement le 
ON 
    h.PersNo = CASE 
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '4' THEN CONCAT('50', le.StaffNumber)
        WHEN LEFT(CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING), 1) = '5' THEN CONCAT('00', le.StaffNumber)
        ELSE CAST(le.StaffNumber AS STRING)
    END
WHERE 
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Brought Forward';

-- Step 6: Calculate leave taken
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW LeaveTaken AS
SELECT
    h.PersNo AS staff_number,
    SUM(f.absence_hours) AS leave_hours_taken
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR h
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_harmonised_db.fact_absence_all f
ON 
    h.PersNo = f.staffnumber
LEFT JOIN 
    StaffCost l 
ON 
    f.staffnumber = l.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    CarriedOver co 
ON 
    f.staffnumber = co.staff_number
CROSS JOIN 
    FileDate fd  -- Add this join to reference fd.file_date
WHERE 
    f.AttendanceorAbsenceType IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
    --AND f.absence_date BETWEEN l.leave_start_date AND fd.file_date
GROUP BY 
    h.PersNo;

-- Step 7: Insert data into the historical table
INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
SELECT 
    h.PersNo,
    h.Firstname,
    h.Lastname,
    h.EmployeeNo,
    h.CoCd,
    h.CompanyCode,
    h.PA,
    h.PersonnelArea,
    h.PSubarea,
    h.PersonnelSubarea,
    h.Orgunit,
    h.OrganizationalUnit,
    h.Organizationalkey,
    h.OrganizationalKey1,
    h.WorkC,
    h.WorkContract,
    h.CT,
    h.ContractType,
    h.PSgroup,
    h.PayBandDescription,
    h.FTE,
    h.Wkhrs,
    h.IndicatorPartTimeEmployee,
    h.S,
    h.EmploymentStatus,
    h.GenderKey,
    h.TRAStartDate,
    h.TRAEndDate,
    h.TRAStatus,
    h.TRAGrade,
    h.PrevPersNo,
    h.ActR,
    h.ReasonforAction,
    h.Position,
    h.Position1,
    h.CostCtr,
    h.CostCentre,
    h.CivilServiceStart,
    h.DatetoCurrentJob,
    h.SeniorityDate,
    h.DatetoSubstGrade,
    h.PersNo1,
    h.NameofManagerOM,
    h.ManagerPosition,
    h.ManagerPositionText,
    h.CounterSignManager,
    h.Loc,
    h.Location,
    h.OrgStartDate,
    h.FixTermEndDate,
    h.LoanStartDate,
    h.LoanEndDate,
    h.EEGrp,
    h.EmployeeGroup,
    h.Annualsalary,
    h.Curr,
    h.NInumber,
    h.Birthdate,
    h.Ageofemployee,
    h.EO,
    h.Ethnicorigin,
    h.NID,
    h.Rel,
    h.ReligiousDenominationKey,
    h.SxO,
    h.WageType,
    h.EmployeeSubgroup,
    h.LOAAbsType,
    h.LOAAbsenceTypeText,
    h.Schemereference,
    h.PensionSchemeName,
    h.DisabilityCode,
    h.DisabilityText,
    h.DisabilityCodeDescription,
    h.PArea,
    h.PayrollArea,
    h.AssignmentNumber,
    h.FTE2,
    h.Report_MonthEnd_Date,
    CURRENT_DATE() AS PDAC_ETL_Date,
    COALESCE(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + COALESCE(co.carried_over_hours, 0) AS leave_entitlement_hrs,
    COALESCE(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0) AS leave_taken_hrs,
    ROUND((COALESCE(sc.leave_allowance, 0) + COALESCE(co.carried_over_hours, 0) - COALESCE(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 0) - COALESCE(lt.leave_hours_taken, 0)), 2) AS leave_remaining_hours,
    COALESCE(ROUND(sc.expected_leave_hours_remaining, 2), 0) AS leave_remaining_prorata_hours
FROM 
    odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR h
LEFT JOIN 
    StaffCost sc 
ON 
    h.PersNo = sc.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    CarriedOver co 
ON 
    sc.staff_number = co.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    LeaveTaken lt 
ON 
    sc.staff_number = lt.staff_number
LEFT JOIN 
    odw_standardised_db.pension_ernic_rates p
ON 
    sc.grade = p.Grade
---WHERE 
  --  RIGHT(CAST(Report_MonthEnd_Date AS STRING), 5) IN ('01-31', '02-28', '02-29', '03-31', '04-30', '05-31', '06-30', '07-31', '08-31', '09-30', '10-31', '11-30', '12-31');
